Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facades.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    A facade which is returned when a customer logs in.

    asafs94

    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(long coupon_id)
                    throws ApplicationException
        A method to be run when a customer makes a purchase. Checks if the customer doesn't already have the coupon, and if the coupon is purchasable.
        If both are true, adds the coupon to the client's coupons in the database.
        Parameters:
        coupon_id -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException
